scripts.docker:build:preprocessing: npm run build && mkdir -p deployment/dockerfiles/httpd/app && cp -R out/* deployment/dockerfiles/httpd/app
scripts.docker:build:local: npm run docker:build:preprocessing && docker build -t rvsriven/images:rvs-next-starter-local deployment/dockerfiles/httpd && npm run docker:clean
scripts.docker:build:prod: npm run docker:build:preprocessing && docker build -t rvsriven/images:rvs-next-starter-prod deployment/dockerfiles/httpd && npm run docker:clean
scripts.docker:deploy:local: npm run docker:deploy:preprocessing && cd deployment && docker-compose -p rvs-next-starter -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d
scripts.docker:deploy:prod: npm run docker:deploy:preprocessing && cd deployment && docker-compose -p rvs-next-starter -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.docker:down:local: cd deployment && docker-compose -p rvs-next-starter -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml down
scripts.docker:down:prod: cd deployment && docker-compose -p rvs-next-starter -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml down
scripts.git:merge:main: git checkout main && git merge development && git push && git checkout development
